definitions.text: something owned; any tangible or intangible possession that is owned by someone
examples: he is a man of property

definitions.text: a basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class
examples: a study of the physical properties of atomic particles

definitions.text: any area set aside for a particular purpose
examples: the president was concerned about the property across from the White House

definitions.text: a construct whereby objects or individuals can be distinguished
examples: self-confidence is not an endearing property

definitions.text: any movable articles or objects used on the set of a play or movie
examples: before every scene he ran down his checklist of props
